channel.title: Need Testers for my server Lava Island
channel.description:
Ok guys thank you for viewing my thread, now i have been working on this server for a bit and i would like to try it out. [b]Now, first things first to clear up.[/b] 1. I do know how to portforward, I did it on my old computer, but it will not let me do on my new one, so im going to try and fix. 2. This means i will be using HAM for testing purposes !only! 3. Those who are picked i will be telling you dats of testing time. 4. Im sorry for any inconvience this causes for any of you who want to test. 5. Those who are picked should have fun. 6. The purpose of testing is not to only play, but to play and tell me what i need to add, how i should improve things. And so forth. [b]Things about my server.[/b] 1. it is pimpscape source, (many many alterations) 2. It is based in the area of the Fremnik Province 3. It needs more working skills, You will find out if you are tester 4. You are not to tell anyone about it if you are a tester, this is ONLY for testing purposes, i will be realesing on a later date. [b]Testers:[/b] 1. Ancientday 2. mightezezima 3. pregg 4.doggiedoo86 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. 10. There will only be 10 testers, enough to have fun while pking and such but not to many. (all of you must test everything out and tell me what i need to fix and what i should add. [b]Here are some pictures.:[/b]
Starting point! [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z158/fireman7778/COMETEST.jpg[/img]
PKing spot!! [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z158/fireman7778/PKSPOT.jpg[/img]
Heres Just a Peek at Rcing [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z158/fireman7778/WORKINGRCING.jpg[/img]
So Please Sign up. If i dont pick you dont be sad or annoyed, im am picking people who have applied, but say if you posted first and i picked a senior member over you and your a junior, dont be upset, i know im only a junior but im trying to get expierenced coders, and players! For those of you who have been accepted please join lavaisland pass123

item.title: Need Testers for my server Lava Island
item.dc:creator: @fireman7778 fireman7778
item.description:
@fireman7778 wrote:

Ok guys thank you for viewing my thread, now i have been working on this server for a bit and i would like to try it out. Now, first things first to clear up.

  1. I do know how to portforward, I did it on my old computer, but it will not let me do on my new one, so im going to try and fix.
  2. This means i will be using HAM for testing purposes !only!
  3. Those who are picked i will be telling you dats of testing time.
  4. Im sorry for any inconvience this causes for any of you who want to test.
  5. Those who are picked should have fun.
  6. The purpose of testing is not to only play, but to play and tell me what i need to add, how i should improve things. And so forth.
    Things about my server.
  7. it is pimpscape source, (many many alterations)
  8. It is based in the area of the Fremnik Province
  9. It needs more working skills, You will find out if you are tester
  10. You are not to tell anyone about it if you are a tester, this is ONLY for testing purposes, i will be realesing on a later date.
    Testers:
  11. Ancientday
  12. mightezezima
  13. pregg
    4.doggiedoo86

There will only be 10 testers, enough to have fun while pking and such but not to many. (all of you must test everything out and tell me what i need to fix and what i should add.
Here are some pictures.:

Starting point!

COMETEST.jpg780×585

PKing spot!!

PKSPOT.jpg780×585

Heres Just a Peek at Rcing

WORKINGRCING.jpg780×585

So Please Sign up.
If i dont pick you dont be sad or annoyed, im am picking people who have applied, but say if you posted first and i picked a senior member over you and your a junior, dont be upset, i know im only a junior but im trying to get expierenced coders, and players!
For those of you who have been accepted please join
lavaisland
pass123
